00021 #ifndef PLUGIN_HPP
00022 #define PLUGIN_HPP
00023 
00024 #include <ndds/ndds_cpp.h>
00025 #include <iostream>
00026 #include <map>
00027 #include <stdexcept>
00028 
00029 class cc_plugin {
00030 
00031     // protected:
00032     //     ~cc_plugin(void) {}
00033 
00034 public:
00041     virtual std::string plugin_class() = 0;
00042   
00043 
00052     virtual bool generate_and_publish_information(DDSDynamicDataWriter *writer,
00053                                                   DDS_DynamicData *data) = 0;
00054     
00065     virtual bool publish_information(DDSDynamicDataWriter *writer,
00066                                      DDS_DynamicData *data) 
00067     {
00068         DDS_InstanceHandle_t instance_handle = DDS_HANDLE_NIL;
00069         DDS_ReturnCode_t retcode = writer->write(*data,instance_handle);
00070         if (retcode != DDS_RETCODE_OK) {
00071             std::cerr << "Error writing instance" << std::endl;
00072             return false;
00073         }
00074         return true;
00075     }
00076   
00082     void destroy_plugin() 
00083     { 
00084         delete this;
00085     }
00086 
00087 };
00088 
00098 typedef cc_plugin* cc_create_plugin_t(std::string plugin_id, 
00099                                       std::map<std::string,std::string> properties);
00100 
00101 
00102 #endif //PLUGIN_HPP
